Flow.description: BF-35: Added functionality to populate list of close dates (Added additional null check)

value.stringValue: ISNEW() && ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "David Mullane" || [Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Chris Harris" || [Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Jeff Roberts" || [Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Dan Heffernan") && [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Full_name__c <>"Scott Meller"

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12
formulas.expression: ISNEW() && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "David Mullane" || {!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Chris Harris" || {!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Jeff Roberts" || {!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Dan Heffernan") && {!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Full_name__c} <>"Scott Meller"

value.stringValue: ((ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].CloseDate ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Amount )) && ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "David Mullane" || ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Chris Harris" || ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Dan Heffernan" || ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Jeff Roberts"))))) && [Opportunity].LastModifiedBy.Full_name__c <> "Scott Meller"

formulas.name: formula_myRule_20
formulas.expression: ((ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.CloseDate} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Amount} )) && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "David Mullane" || ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Chris Harris" || ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Dan Heffernan" || ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Jeff Roberts"))))) && {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.Full_name__c} <> "Scott Meller"

value.stringValue: ((ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].CloseDate ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Amount )) && ([Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Jeff Roberts" || [Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Jarrod Rapalje" || [Opportunity].Owner.Full_name__c = "Glenn Ezard")) && [Opportunity].LastModifiedBy.Full_name__c <> "Brittany Russell"

formulas.name: formula_myRule_24
formulas.expression: ((ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.CloseDate} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Amount} )) && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Jeff Roberts" || {!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Jarrod Rapalje" || {!myVariable_current.Owner.Full_name__c} = "Glenn Ezard")) && {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.Full_name__c} <> "Brittany Russell"
